alert.note: Alert for Cambria; Clearfield (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 9:56PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CLEARFIELD AND NORTHEASTERN CAMBRIA COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM EDT... At 956 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Punxsutawney to 15 miles north of Ebensburg. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Cambria, Curwensville, Patton, Hastings, Rockton, Carrolltown, Blandburg, Prince Gallitzin State Park, Colver, Irvona, Coalport, Ramey, Westover, Mahaffey, Grampian, Troutville, Burnside, Glen Hope, Lumber City and New Washington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
